name: Beet Soup
author: DEELIGHTUK
summary: A gorgeous, healthy, and very tasty beet soup that's so simple to make. Beets and sauteed onions and garlic simmer in beef broth before being finished with a swirl of cream.
directions: Warm olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Stir in onions and garlic; cook until soft but not browned, about 5 minutes
Stir in beets, and cook for 1 minute
Stir in stock, and season with salt and pepper
Bring to a boil; cover, and simmer until the beets are tender, about 20 to 30 minutes
Remove from heat, and allow to cool slightly
In batches, add soup to a food processor, and pulse until liquefied
Return soup to saucepan, and gently heat through
Ladle into bowls, and garnish with a swirl of cream
